title: Exquisite Emerald and Diamond Three-Layer Haaram
materials: Premium Grade Diamonds with FG color (97.570 Fg)
Natural Emeralds (8.94 carats total) and Rubies (7.03 carats total).
features: A stunning three-layer Haaram necklace featuring a delicate vine and floral motif encrusted with sparkling diamonds. Each layer is adorned with a gracefully dangling, pear-shaped Emerald pendant, with diamond detailing below the bottommost pendant. Meticulously handcrafted with exceptional detail. Traditional floral design with a modern flair.
colors: Predominantly white (diamonds) and lush green (emeralds). The gold adds a touch of warm undertone.
occasions: and significant cultural events like Seemantham or a grand reception. Also suitable for making a bold statement at high-end events.
description: This Haaram is a masterpiece of craftsmanship, blending the timeless elegance of traditional South Indian jewelry with a contemporary design. The exceptional quality of diamonds and vibrant emeralds guarantees brilliance and lasting value. It's a statement piece that signifies prosperity, beauty, and cultural heritage (Samskruti)
